title: What are the important figures and works referenced in this text on esotericism and philosophy?
first_phrase: The remaining text consists of various references, from ancient to contemporary authors, who explore mysticism, theology, and philosophy. The names mentioned include David L 24, David-Neel, Dawa-Samdup, De Coulanges, De Guaita, Della Riviera, De Lorenzo, De Maistre, De Martino, De Pharmaco Catholico, and others. The text delves into different aspects related to these authors' works and insights, including mythology, spirituality, and metaphysics.

last_phrase: In conclusion, this list of references covers a vast array of individuals and works that have contributed to the understanding and exploration of esotericism, spirituality, and philosophy. By engaging with these materials, one can gain a deeper understanding of the world and themselves, and explore their own spiritual journey with greater depth and clarity.
